content.rendered:
Tuesday, January 7, 2025
Today is a “C” Day

 

Club Meetings and Information

 

  • Attention Pop Culture Icon Club – we are meeting this Wednesday (January 8th) in the Large Group Room after school. Please let Ms. Schnorr know if you need a late bus pass. See you there!
  • International Club Is meeting in room 255 after school on Wednesday, January 8. All are welcome to join! 
  • This Thursday is the first day of ski club. It is going to be cold so please dress appropriately. At dismissal, pack up your school materials and report to the auditorium lobby to pick up your boot bag. Have your helmet handy for the chaperones to check. Wait quietly in the auditorium until you are told to load your bus. 
  • Are you a 7th or 8th grader interested in being on a school team? Like to Swim? Come to Mr. Muldner’s office on Friday – January 10th during your flex and you can learn more about being on the modified swim team. 
Check out the Maple Avenue Club Calendar for club meetings and room information! 

 

As always, BE SAFE, BE RESPECTFUL, BE RESPONSIBLE, BE KIND!  

 

Make it a great day, or not…the choice is yours.
